          <title>
            <string language="en">Temperature variation with height from the Earth's surface</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Temperaturvariante mit Höhe von der Oberfläche

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Variation de la température par rapport à la

superficie de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the variation of temperature with height from the surface of the Earth.</string>
          </description>
